name: Snipiyo / スナイピヨ
description: An action game using a sniper gun. A sniper's chick that flies freely, it's "Snipiyo"!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core i3-530 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / ATI Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 760 / ATI Radeon HD 7970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
